goals__remit:
My consultancy works with individuals, scientific and cultural organisations and foundations in helping them imagine and create new strategy and directions. 
 
The focus is mainly but not exclusively on the arts/science field. 
 
I am also a writer and independent curator. 
I work mainly in Switzerland, Sweden and Italy. 
 
Current clients include Science Gallery Venice  at Ca Foscari University, Italy which is part of the Science Gallery International network colliding arts and science, the city of Kyoto in Japan, Bildmuseet in Sweden which is also part of Umea University. 
 
I am also a cultural advisor and I am on the cultural board for the JRC - Ispra, Italy, HEL (House of Electronic Arts Basel) and CERN.
